name: andromeda
description: Andromeda is a template to build modern WebApp/PWA with React.JS on a top of a server builded with Express.js
author: Giuseppe Gigliotti <giuseppegigliottidev@gmail.com>

scripts.webapp:serve:dev: cd ./api && yarn run lint:eslint:fix && yarn run backend::serve
scripts.webapp:client:dev: cd ./client && yarn run lint:prettify && yarn run start
scripts.webapp:run:dev: yarn run webapp:serve:dev &&  yarn run webapp:client:dev
